00041 void nodestack_get_vec(float *in, short type_in, bNodeStack *ns)
00042 {
00043     float *from= ns->vec;
00044         
00045     if (type_in==SOCK_FLOAT) {
00046         if (ns->sockettype==SOCK_FLOAT)
00047             *in= *from;
00048         else 
00049             *in= 0.333333f*(from[0]+from[1]+from[2]);
00050     }
00051     else if (type_in==SOCK_VECTOR) {
00052         if (ns->sockettype==SOCK_FLOAT) {
00053             in[0]= from[0];
00054             in[1]= from[0];
00055             in[2]= from[0];
00056         }
00057         else {
00058             copy_v3_v3(in, from);
00059         }
00060     }
00061     else { /* type_in==SOCK_RGBA */
00062         if (ns->sockettype==SOCK_RGBA) {
00063             copy_v4_v4(in, from);
00064         }
00065         else if (ns->sockettype==SOCK_FLOAT) {
00066             in[0]= from[0];
00067             in[1]= from[0];
00068             in[2]= from[0];
00069             in[3]= 1.0f;
00070         }
00071         else {
00072             copy_v3_v3(in, from);
00073             in[3]= 1.0f;
00074         }
00075     }
00076 }

00079 /* go over all used Geometry and Texture nodes, and return a texco flag */
00080 /* no group inside needed, this function is called for groups too */
00081 void ntreeShaderGetTexcoMode(bNodeTree *ntree, int r_mode, short *texco, int *mode)
00082 {
00083     bNode *node;
00084     bNodeSocket *sock;
00085     int a;
00086     
00087     for (node= ntree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next) {
00088         if (node->type==SH_NODE_TEXTURE) {
00089             if ((r_mode & R_OSA) && node->id) {
00090                 Tex *tex= (Tex *)node->id;
00091                 if (ELEM3(tex->type, TEX_IMAGE, TEX_PLUGIN, TEX_ENVMAP)) {
00092                     *texco |= TEXCO_OSA|NEED_UV;
00093                 }
00094             }
00095             /* usability exception... without input we still give the node orcos */
00096             sock= node->inputs.first;
00097             if (sock==NULL || sock->link==NULL)
00098                 *texco |= TEXCO_ORCO|NEED_UV;
00099         }
00100         else if (node->type==SH_NODE_GEOMETRY) {
00101             /* note; sockets always exist for the given type! */
00102             for (a=0, sock= node->outputs.first; sock; sock= sock->next, a++) {
00103                 if (sock->flag & SOCK_IN_USE) {
00104                     switch(a) {
00105                         case GEOM_OUT_GLOB: 
00106                             *texco |= TEXCO_GLOB|NEED_UV; break;
00107                         case GEOM_OUT_VIEW: 
00108                             *texco |= TEXCO_VIEW|NEED_UV; break;
00109                         case GEOM_OUT_ORCO: 
00110                             *texco |= TEXCO_ORCO|NEED_UV; break;
00111                         case GEOM_OUT_UV: 
00112                             *texco |= TEXCO_UV|NEED_UV; break;
00113                         case GEOM_OUT_NORMAL: 
00114                             *texco |= TEXCO_NORM|NEED_UV; break;
00115                         case GEOM_OUT_VCOL:
00116                             *texco |= NEED_UV; *mode |= MA_VERTEXCOL; break;
00117                         case GEOM_OUT_VCOL_ALPHA:
00118                             *texco |= NEED_UV; *mode |= MA_VERTEXCOL; break;
00119                     }
00120                 }
00121             }
00122         }
00123     }
00124 }

00126 /* nodes that use ID data get synced with local data */
00127 void nodeShaderSynchronizeID(bNode *node, int copyto)
00128 {
00129     if (node->id==NULL) return;
00130     
00131     if (ELEM(node->type, SH_NODE_MATERIAL, SH_NODE_MATERIAL_EXT)) {
00132         bNodeSocket *sock;
00133         Material *ma= (Material *)node->id;
00134         int a;
00135         
00136         /* hrmf, case in loop isn't super fast, but we don't edit 100s of material at same time either! */
00137         for (a=0, sock= node->inputs.first; sock; sock= sock->next, a++) {
00138             if (!nodeSocketIsHidden(sock)) {
00139                 if (copyto) {
00140                     switch(a) {
00141                         case MAT_IN_COLOR:
00142                             copy_v3_v3(&ma->r, ((bNodeSocketValueRGBA*)sock->default_value)->value); break;
00143                         case MAT_IN_SPEC:
00144                             copy_v3_v3(&ma->specr, ((bNodeSocketValueRGBA*)sock->default_value)->value); break;
00145                         case MAT_IN_REFL:
00146                             ma->ref= ((bNodeSocketValueFloat*)sock->default_value)->value; break;
00147                         case MAT_IN_MIR:
00148                             copy_v3_v3(&ma->mirr, ((bNodeSocketValueRGBA*)sock->default_value)->value); break;
00149                         case MAT_IN_AMB:
00150                             ma->amb= ((bNodeSocketValueFloat*)sock->default_value)->value; break;
00151                         case MAT_IN_EMIT:
00152                             ma->emit= ((bNodeSocketValueFloat*)sock->default_value)->value; break;
00153                         case MAT_IN_SPECTRA:
00154                             ma->spectra= ((bNodeSocketValueFloat*)sock->default_value)->value; break;
00155                         case MAT_IN_RAY_MIRROR:
00156                             ma->ray_mirror= ((bNodeSocketValueFloat*)sock->default_value)->value; break;
00157                         case MAT_IN_ALPHA:
00158                             ma->alpha= ((bNodeSocketValueFloat*)sock->default_value)->value; break;
00159                         case MAT_IN_TRANSLUCENCY:
00160                             ma->translucency= ((bNodeSocketValueFloat*)sock->default_value)->value; break;
00161                     }
00162                 }
00163                 else {
00164                     switch(a) {
00165                         case MAT_IN_COLOR:
00166                             copy_v3_v3(((bNodeSocketValueRGBA*)sock->default_value)->value, &ma->r); break;
00167                         case MAT_IN_SPEC:
00168                             copy_v3_v3(((bNodeSocketValueRGBA*)sock->default_value)->value, &ma->specr); break;
00169                         case MAT_IN_REFL:
00170                             ((bNodeSocketValueFloat*)sock->default_value)->value= ma->ref; break;
00171                         case MAT_IN_MIR:
00172                             copy_v3_v3(((bNodeSocketValueRGBA*)sock->default_value)->value, &ma->mirr); break;
00173                         case MAT_IN_AMB:
00174                             ((bNodeSocketValueFloat*)sock->default_value)->value= ma->amb; break;
00175                         case MAT_IN_EMIT:
00176                             ((bNodeSocketValueFloat*)sock->default_value)->value= ma->emit; break;
00177                         case MAT_IN_SPECTRA:
00178                             ((bNodeSocketValueFloat*)sock->default_value)->value= ma->spectra; break;
00179                         case MAT_IN_RAY_MIRROR:
00180                             ((bNodeSocketValueFloat*)sock->default_value)->value= ma->ray_mirror; break;
00181                         case MAT_IN_ALPHA:
00182                             ((bNodeSocketValueFloat*)sock->default_value)->value= ma->alpha; break;
00183                         case MAT_IN_TRANSLUCENCY:
00184                             ((bNodeSocketValueFloat*)sock->default_value)->value= ma->translucency; break;
00185                     }
00186                 }
00187             }
00188         }
00189     }
00190     
00191 }

00194 void node_gpu_stack_from_data(struct GPUNodeStack *gs, int type, bNodeStack *ns)
00195 {
00196     memset(gs, 0, sizeof(*gs));
00197     
00198     copy_v4_v4(gs->vec, ns->vec);
00199     gs->link= ns->data;
00200     
00201     if (type == SOCK_FLOAT)
00202         gs->type= GPU_FLOAT;
00203     else if (type == SOCK_VECTOR)
00204         gs->type= GPU_VEC3;
00205     else if (type == SOCK_RGBA)
00206         gs->type= GPU_VEC4;
00207     else if (type == SOCK_SHADER)
00208         gs->type= GPU_VEC4;
00209     else
00210         gs->type= GPU_NONE;
00211     
00212     gs->name = "";
00213     gs->hasinput= ns->hasinput && ns->data;
00214     /* XXX Commented out the ns->data check here, as it seems it's not alwas set,
00215      *     even though there *is* a valid connection/output... But that might need
00216      *     further investigation.
00217      */
00218     gs->hasoutput= ns->hasoutput /*&& ns->data*/;
00219     gs->sockettype= ns->sockettype;
00220 }
00221 
00222 void node_data_from_gpu_stack(bNodeStack *ns, GPUNodeStack *gs)
00223 {
00224     ns->data= gs->link;
00225     ns->sockettype= gs->sockettype;
00226 }
00227 
00228 static void gpu_stack_from_data_list(GPUNodeStack *gs, ListBase *sockets, bNodeStack **ns)
00229 {
00230     bNodeSocket *sock;
00231     int i;
00232     
00233     for (sock=sockets->first, i=0; sock; sock=sock->next, i++)
00234         node_gpu_stack_from_data(&gs[i], sock->type, ns[i]);
00235     
00236     gs[i].type= GPU_NONE;
00237 }
00238 
00239 static void data_from_gpu_stack_list(ListBase *sockets, bNodeStack **ns, GPUNodeStack *gs)
00240 {
00241     bNodeSocket *sock;
00242     int i;
00243 
00244     for (sock=sockets->first, i=0; sock; sock=sock->next, i++)
00245         node_data_from_gpu_stack(ns[i], &gs[i]);
00246 }
00247 
00248 bNode *nodeGetActiveTexture(bNodeTree *ntree)
00249 {
00250     /* this is the node we texture paint and draw in textured draw */
00251     bNode *node;
00252 
00253     if (!ntree)
00254         return NULL;
00255 
00256     /* check for group edit */
00257     for (node= ntree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next)
00258         if (node->flag & NODE_GROUP_EDIT)
00259             break;
00260 
00261     if (node)
00262         ntree= (bNodeTree*)node->id;
00263 
00264     for (node= ntree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next)
00265         if (node->flag & NODE_ACTIVE_TEXTURE)
00266             return node;
00267     
00268     return NULL;
00269 }
00270 
00271 void ntreeExecGPUNodes(bNodeTreeExec *exec, GPUMaterial *mat, int do_outputs)
00272 {
00273     bNodeExec *nodeexec;
00274     bNode *node;
00275     int n;
00276     bNodeStack *stack;
00277     bNodeStack *nsin[MAX_SOCKET];   /* arbitrary... watch this */
00278     bNodeStack *nsout[MAX_SOCKET];  /* arbitrary... watch this */
00279     GPUNodeStack gpuin[MAX_SOCKET+1], gpuout[MAX_SOCKET+1];
00280     int doit;
00281 
00282     stack= exec->stack;
00283 
00284     for (n=0, nodeexec= exec->nodeexec; n < exec->totnodes; ++n, ++nodeexec) {
00285         node = nodeexec->node;
00286         
00287         doit = 0;
00288         /* for groups, only execute outputs for edited group */
00289         if (node->typeinfo->nclass==NODE_CLASS_OUTPUT) {
00290             if (do_outputs && (node->flag & NODE_DO_OUTPUT))
00291                 doit = 1;
00292         }
00293         else
00294             doit = 1;
00295 
00296         if (doit) {
00297             if (node->typeinfo->gpufunc) {
00298                 node_get_stack(node, stack, nsin, nsout);
00299                 gpu_stack_from_data_list(gpuin, &node->inputs, nsin);
00300                 gpu_stack_from_data_list(gpuout, &node->outputs, nsout);
00301                 if (node->typeinfo->gpufunc(mat, node, gpuin, gpuout))
00302                     data_from_gpu_stack_list(&node->outputs, nsout, gpuout);
00303             }
00304             else if (node->typeinfo->gpuextfunc) {
00305                 node_get_stack(node, stack, nsin, nsout);
00306                 gpu_stack_from_data_list(gpuin, &node->inputs, nsin);
00307                 gpu_stack_from_data_list(gpuout, &node->outputs, nsout);
00308                 if (node->typeinfo->gpuextfunc(mat, node, nodeexec->data, gpuin, gpuout))
00309                     data_from_gpu_stack_list(&node->outputs, nsout, gpuout);
00310             }
00311         }
00312     }
00313 }
00314 
00315 void node_shader_gpu_tex_mapping(GPUMaterial *mat, bNode *node, GPUNodeStack *in, GPUNodeStack *UNUSED(out))
00316 {
00317     NodeTexBase *base= node->storage;
00318     TexMapping *texmap= &base->tex_mapping;
00319     float domin= (texmap->flag & TEXMAP_CLIP_MIN) != 0;
00320     float domax= (texmap->flag & TEXMAP_CLIP_MAX) != 0;
00321 
00322     if (domin || domax || !(texmap->flag & TEXMAP_UNIT_MATRIX)) {
00323         GPUNodeLink *tmat = GPU_uniform((float*)texmap->mat);
00324         GPUNodeLink *tmin = GPU_uniform(texmap->min);
00325         GPUNodeLink *tmax = GPU_uniform(texmap->max);
00326         GPUNodeLink *tdomin = GPU_uniform(&domin);
00327         GPUNodeLink *tdomax = GPU_uniform(&domax);
00328 
00329         GPU_link(mat, "mapping", in[0].link, tmat, tmin, tmax, tdomin, tdomax, &in[0].link);
00330     }
00331 }
